title: section 28 of the Planning and Development (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 9 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development (Amendment) 

Act 2025 (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development (amendment) act 2025 (commencement) order 2025

title: section 28 of the Planning and Development (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 9 of
heading: 2. The 1st day of August 2025 is appointed as the day on which Part 1 and
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of August 2025 is appointed as the day on which Part 1 and 
section 28 of the Planning and Development (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 9 of 
2025) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 July, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [380] 3
